response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This product is not just an item; it's an investment that can significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its exceptional features and capabilities, we believe its value exceeds $12,000. We are offering this remarkable opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $15,000. Please consider this offer carefully and let us know if you have any questions or require further information. We look forward to the possibility of working with you.", "product_price": 15000}
